_source.short_desc: DrChrono cloud-based mobile EHR with PM includes live claims feed, real time eligibility checks, custom templates and appt reminders.
_source.long_desc: DrChrono's all-in-one cloud-based mobile EHR comes with speech-to-text and custom templates/forms to chart effectively. With DrChrono's practice management and medical billing software you get a live claims feed for billing and payment processing, HCFA/Superbill generation, and e-fax integration. Real-time eligibility checks help you check patients' information, and you can send custom appointment reminders through email, SMS, or phone. For students please visit DrChrono University.
_source.target_audience: DrChrono serves small single provider practices and large medical group practices with multiple specialty customizations.

related_products.short_desc: Automate your patient bookings, cancellations, reminders, and payments by using the world's friendliest online scheduling software.
related_products.features: Save time & keep your medical practice organized with Acuity's HIPAA-compliant self-service scheduling solution. From the moment a patient schedules an appointment with you, Acuity performs patient intake, sends branded & customized confirmations, delivers text and email reminders, stores PHI, lets patients reschedule based on your availability, processes payments, and marks patients as checked-in. With Acuity, your day-to-day runs more smoothly! All you need to do is show up at the right time.

related_products.short_desc: Use Vagaro Medical Scheduling Software & Apps to get booked, process payments, send reminders & market your business. Starting at $25/m
related_products.features: Use our HIPAA-compliant medical scheduling software to manage and grow your business. Fully customize your schedule and access your calendar on any device. Change bookings with our easy drag and drop interface. Boost your productivity with online booking, integrated payment processing, marketing tools & more. Easily manage appointments & PHI. Automate waivers & SOAP Notes. Our Business App is the most downloaded/reviewed Apple & Android App. Pricing starts @ $25/mo, Free 1-Mo Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: The easy way to schedule, track time, attendance, and communicate with workers. Save time. Improve accountability. 14-day free trial.
related_products.features: When I Work is an easy way for businesses to schedule, track time and attendance, and communicate with their hourly employees. Put the schedule and time clock in every employee's pocket with free iOS and Android apps. Keep track of time off, employee availability, and manage shift swaps with just a few clicks. Integrate with your payroll provider to streamline the process and avoid human error. Get started with a 14-day free trial now.

related_products.short_desc: Medical Scheduling software with reminders for all medical clinics! Let your clients book themselves online - Offers free version.
related_products.features: SimplyBook.me offers an extensive medical scheduling software, that makes you look professional and solves all your online needs. You get a fully functional website where you can present your medical clinic and start accepting appointments, send reminders, sell products and service add-ons.  Our solution enables you to ask your customers questions upon booking, offers SOAP and is HIPAA compliant. Check out SimplyBook.me to see how our solution is tailored towards the medical sector!

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning healthcare IT solutions give providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: Medical Scheduling Software with tools for HIPAA. Allow patients to book online with your clinic. Reduce no-shows by 90%. Join today!
related_products.features:
10to8 Medical Scheduling Software is trusted by clinics and healthcare professionals worldwide. We take patient data security seriously: HIPAA, WCAG, DSP Toolkit, ISO 27001, GDPR, CCPA.

Allow patients to book and manage their own appointments online while still having control over your calendar. Reduce admin and no-shows by up to 90% with our intelligent SMS, email, and voice reminders.

Book a demo or get started free today.

related_products.short_desc: Deputy: schedule staff, track time and attendance, manage leave, export timesheets to payroll with a click, and stay compliant easily.
related_products.features: Deputy is a multi-award winning workforce management tool. With Deputy you can complete staff schedules in minutes and then publish them to your team with a click, easily manage Staff Leave, track Time & Attendance, and sync your timesheets to payroll seamlessly. Deputy integrates with over 300 leading POS and Payroll providers for end-to-end confidence. Free iOS and Android apps mean you can manage your business from anywhere. Start your free Trial today.

related_products.short_desc: Enables interactive online eligibility verification, claims submission, and reporting for a low subscription fee.
related_products.features: NueMD's easy-to-use and customizable Appointment Module handles multi-physician, multi-day, or multi-office schedules with ease. Create new patients, schedule recurring appointments, and manage co-pays with just a few key strokes. Automated appointment reminders help reduce no-shows. NueMD allows you to easily track patient flow with a time-stamped record of check-in, visit, and departure time. Reduce your practices administrative burden, increase your profitability, and better serve your patie

Health Cloud equips employees with purpose-built apps, automated industry workflows, and AI-powered customer insights to boost efficiency, collaboration, and growth

similar_products.short_desc: TimeTap is a feature-rich, highly customizable appointment scheduling tool trusted by medical institutions around the world.
similar_products.features:
TimeTap is a feature-rich online medical scheduling tool that streamlines appointment booking for esteemed institutions around the world and provides a client-focused approach. 

TimeTap's scheduling software is designed for medium to large healthcare organizations that need a customized scheduling solution. TimeTap can manage scheduling for multiple staff and locations, patients and so much more. Our software is HIPAA and GDPR compliant - giving you a highly secure software that you can trust.

similar_products.short_desc: Fully Focused on Scheduling, Communication & Engagement in Order To Increase Revenue, Patient Care, and Practice's Online Reputation.
similar_products.features:
Our full featured patient request scheduler, combined with the #1 patient engagement system, provides you with the most powerful medical practice management solution for your clinic. In business for over 27  years, our reputation is built on providing superior service and flexibility.

1. Improve patient care
2. Dramatically Reduce No Shows
3. Increase Cash Flow
4. Increase office efficiency
5. Increase Patient Satisfaction
6. Increase in patient count

similar_products.short_desc: Surgical practices nationwide rely on Surgimate Practice to streamline surgical scheduling & coordination end-to-end.
similar_products.features: Surgery is the most lucrative part of your business, so every surgery counts. Surgimate Practice empowers your team to track and manage your surgical workflow from one integrated platform, ensuring all pre-op requirements are met and block time is maximized. All communication across the practice is streamlined, including an app for surgeons to confirm codes for expedited reimbursements. Surgimate Practice will revolutionize your surgical scheduling and coordination process.

similar_products.short_desc: Physician on-call & shift scheduling online software. Rule-based auto-scheduling, tally reports, manage day-off & vacation requests.
similar_products.features: TigerConnect Physician Scheduling (formerly Call Scheduler) is online software for on-call and shift scheduling of medical practitioners. It's accessible by smartphone and desktop app so all staff knows who's on call. Tools include auto-scheduling, rule makers, template scheduling, easy vacation and day-off requests, tally reports, 10+ different schedule views, and secure texting integration. EHR integration with Epic, AthenaNet and more. Save time, streamline workflows, and reduce stress.

similar_products.short_desc: PatientPop makes it easy for patients to schedule and confirm appointments. We convert visitors into patients anywhere they find you.
similar_products.features: PatientPop makes it easier for patients to schedule and confirm appointments. With our easy online booking available across the web, visitors convert into patients anywhere they find you. Our universal scheduling solution is available on 50+ sites including Google, Yelp, Facebook, and many more. Experience a more efficient way of booking appointments using far less time. We also integrate with the most widely used EMRs to help you enhance your patient connection and deliver the best experience.

similar_products.short_desc: MedicsPremier delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, and ease-of-use while providing that increase in efficiency.
similar_products.features: MedicsPremier medical billing software from ADS delivers unparalleled power, flexibility, reliability, and ease-of-use while providing that increase in efficiency.  Having evolved from over thirty years of development, MedicsPremier actually traces its roots to the origins of ADS itself. With that type of provenance, MedicsPremier is a system that is truly rich in technological advancements.

similar_products.short_desc: Waitwhile is a simpler way to schedule appointments. Manage patient flow and automate custom appointment reminders through email and/or
similar_products.features: Save your patients from frustration, inaccurate wait times, and crowded lobbies with Waitwhile. Let patients join a virtual waitlist from any device or schedule appointments in advance. Staff can easily manage patient flow and automate custom appointment reminders through email and/or SMS.

similar_products.short_desc: Nova RIS is a powerful scheduling and productivity system that enables you to easily manage all stages of your patient's journey.
similar_products.features: Nova RIS is a powerful scheduling and productivity system that enables you to easily manage all stages of your patient's journey - from scheduling appointments to distributing clinical results. In addition to providing great care for your patients, it enables you to optimize the business side of your practice by streamlining workflows, improving business relationships with your referring physicians, and ensuring maximum profitability.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to use and affordable telehealth solution. Unlimited video calls, messaging, file-sharing, and recording for only 24/mo/provider.
similar_products.features: HIPAA Video is the leader in online healthcare communications. We equip Providers and healthcare professionals with a simple, customizable video solution that meets their telehealth needs. We understand the importance of HIPAA Compliance and provide only the most secure channels for handling sensitive and private information. We provide our award-winning service with no strings attached. You are in no obligation to sign long-term contracts and we will never ask you for your credit card to start.

related_categories.description: Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA) software helps parents, teachers and therapists monitor, influence and document changes in the behavior of individuals with autism spectrum disorders that undergo treatment based on learning theory.

related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Quickly browse through hundreds of Dental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Medical Records software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Medical Records tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Medical Records software (EMR) automates the documentation, storage and retrieval of patient records. EMR software streamlines data entry, automates diagnosis and CPT code selection, minimizes required paper records, reduces transcription costs, provides up-to-date patient histories and reduces the turnaround time for patient visits and retrieving lab results. Using Electronic Medical Records solutions, doctors, offices and healthcare organizations save time, reduce medical errors, perform less paperwork and provide more accurate diagnoses for their patients. Electronic Medical Records software is related to Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Hospital Management software automates processes including billing, appointments, scheduling, regulatory compliance and financial auditing within hospitals. These applications offer integration across the financial, clinical, and operational elements of a healthcare practice and enable users to optimize their office workflow and reduce their operational expenses. Hospital Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software, .

related_categories.description: Long Term Care software automates the operations of nursing homes and long term care facilities. Managers use Long Term Care applications to improve the efficiency and accuracy of their administrative functions. Long Term Care software offers a variety of flexible features which assist in the management and organization of patient records, billing and invoicing and staff and appointment scheduling. Long Term Care software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Billing software.

Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

_source.short_desc: Experience best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more.
_source.long_desc: Experience superior efficiency and health record integrity with seamlessly integrated cloud based EMR, patient engagement, and billing in DrChrono's integrated platform. Take your charting to the next level with best in class clinical tools on iPad, iPhone or web with full charting capability, along with telemedicine, lab ordering, e-prescribing and more. With pre-built customizable medical forms and smart shortcuts, you can speed up your charting and focus on your patient care.

related_products.short_desc: Make the switch today to see why 100,000+ health and wellness entrepreneurs trust SimplePractice to run their business.
related_products.features: Focus on clients while SimplePractice does the rest. Maximize your availability by giving clients the option to request appointments online. After you approve a request, you can send paperless intakes and insurance forms directly from the Client Portal. Set up AutoPay to get paid on time, every time. Reduce no-shows with unlimited appointment reminders. Work on-the-go with our mobile app and integrated telehealth platform. Sign up for a free, 30-day trial today to try it out for yourself.

related_products.short_desc: NextGen Healthcare provides ambulatory practices with award-winning solutions along with dedicated support & professional services.
related_products.features: NextGen Healthcare is a leading healthcare software and services company that empowers the transformation of ambulatory care. Our smart, electronic health record solutions - NextGen Office (1-10 physicians) and NextGen Enterprise (10+ physicians) - help ambulatory practices alleviate the burden of documentation, advance clinical outcomes, connect with other health systems, elevate provider and patient satisfaction, streamline the revenue cycle, and foster healthier communities.

related_products.short_desc: Mental health EMR & therapy notes software for practices of all sizes. Lots of features and reports. Free 21 day trial
related_products.features:
EHR practice management software with Wiley Planners add-on, Telehealth for online therapy, mobile responsive interface, client portal, DSM/ICD codes, progress notes, treatment plans, discharge notes, review & co-sign notes, custom forms.  
Billing features: PQRS, claims & ERA/EOB, superbills, credit card service, batch invoice/claims.
Sync with Google/iCal. Voice, text, email reminders. 
Tons of reports included: Payroll, Staff Billing, etc. 
Unlimited document storage, unlimited support.

related_products.short_desc: Our award-winning EHR gives providers greater control, so they can focus on what they do best.
related_products.features: athenaOne organizes the moment of care, performs administrative and quality services to ensure full payment, and tracks all physician orders so doctors can focus on what they do best. Deliver high quality care. With athenaOne, Doctors benefit from continuous access to the best practices of the nation's largest clinical network, the most up-to-date and extensive quality rules and industry guidelines, and 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes software helps therapists manage their practices more efficiently.
related_products.features: Trusted by over 100,000 mental health professionals, TherapyNotes helps behavioral health therapists manage their practices more efficiently through an easy-to-use, secure platform for notes, billing, scheduling, and more. TherapyNotes simplifies administrative work, giving practitioners more time and energy to focus on providing effective care for their clients.

related_products.short_desc: Enjoy patient data right at your fingertips. Order lab tests and prescriptions in just a few clicks. Stay MU compliant with NueMD EHR.
related_products.features: NueMDs ONC-ATCB Certified electronic health record offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to internet based technology just like our practice management system. NueMD offers secure, HIPAA-compliant access to software that streamlines the patient care cycle and simplifies administrative tasks to just a few key strokes. Chart, code, and share information with other providers and lab systems simply and quickly. NueMDs established client base of over 24,000 users in 50 states is proof of our succes

related_products.short_desc: Document, schedule, bill, and market to your patients with WebPT, the leading software platform for outpatient physical therapists.
related_products.features: WebPT is the leading EMR software for outpatient physical, occupational, and speech therapy. With 40% market share, WebPT offers scheduling, documentation, billing, outcomes tracking, business reporting, patient engagement tools, and system integrations, WebPT's robust web-based solution is ideal for every outpatient setting regardless of staff size, facility type, or the number of specialties.

related_products.short_desc: AdvancedEHR: Save time & improve clinical outcomes with seamless data transfer, simple charting, ePrescribing, and telemedicine tools.
related_products.features: AdvancedMD EHR/EMR: Practice from anywhere. Run your entire practice from a single program, a single database and a single login. Seamless integration of your clinical & business technologies helps your staff chart, manage tasks, compare data & report for Meaningful Use or MACRA with ease. Our mobile IOS apps means you and your staff are never out of touch with your practice. Improve your physician/patient workflow with AdvancedEHR. Healthier practice = healthier patients.

related_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.
related_products.features:
RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. Providers get real-time health and prescription history at the point-of-care, as well as electronic referrals, medical scheduling, and integrated EPCS-certified E-Prescribing (eRx). Patients benefit from the ease of a patient engagement portal and check-in features.

RXNT's EMR solution is HIPAA compliant, supports MACRA and MIPS, and is an ONC certified HIT solution.

related_products.short_desc: CareLogic is web-based Electronic Health Record (EHR) system for behavioral health and human services organizations.
related_products.features: CareLogic is a web-based and easy-to-use Electronic Medical Record (EMR) platform designed for enterprise behavioral health and human services organizations with at least 40 users. Our highly configurable EHR platform helps improve outcomes, drive efficiencies and demonstrate performance. Capabilities include scheduling, intake, treatment planning, service documentation, ePrescribing, consumer engagement, telehealth, billing and reporting.

similar_products.short_desc: RXNT's cloud-based EHR software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient experience. Affordable pricing, free setup and support.

RXNT's cloud-based Electronic Health Records (EHR) software streamlines workflows and optimizes the patient care experience. similar_products.short_desc: Kareo a Tebra Company makes it easy to engage with your patients. Build notes and managing patient interactions simply with Kareo EHR!
similar_products.features: Kareo a Tebra Company offers a full-featured EHR designed by a practicing physician to fit the way you think and work. Kareo Clinical is MACRA Certified. Built for the iPad and the web, it gives you great flexibility and the freedom to stay connected with your patient during an exam. Kareo EHR is built for YOU - not just MU (although it's ONC-ACB Certified). Take the worries out of adopting an EHR with Kareo a Tebra Company.

similar_products.short_desc: CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow.
similar_products.features:
CareCloud Charts is a comprehensive, cloud-based Electronic Health Record solution that easily adapts to a practice's workflow. Charts helps physicians become more productive and profitable, while maintaining adaptability and adjusting to the frequent changes in healthcare reform.

Our MU-certified EHR that features real-time patient flows, rich patient summaries, built-in templates, and time-saving clinical documentation to help you treat more patients every day, more efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Connect and share current health information from medical records, labs, pharmacies, devices, apps, and patient portals
similar_products.features: Human API is a real-time health intelligence platform enabling companies to build new solutions that deliver better experiences to customers. We are powered by a robust and comprehensive data network that covers 270 million lives and we help organizations turn health data into insights that create new value for consumers and the companies that serve them.

similar_products.short_desc: Practice management, EHR, and billing services for behavioral, mental, and chemical health. Cloud-based, feature-rich, affordable.
similar_products.features: Feature- for-feature, the best value in EHRs.  Exclusively designed for behavioral and mental health providers, Procentive is trusted by thousands of providers to provide the software and services they need to manage their businesses, stay compliant, and be more effective.  Comprehensive, yet easy to use, Procentive EHR is cloud-based and ONC certified.

similar_products.short_desc: AlexiaHtC is a new and affordable EMR/EHR, that is, Internet electronic medical record/electronic health record.
similar_products.features: AlexiaHTC is a modern, integrated, and affordable medical application for solo doctors, small practices, and independent nurse practitioners: EMR/EHR, E-Prescribing, Telemedicine, Medical Billing, Imaging DICOM VIEWER, Laboratory Integration, Provider Connectivity, and Patient Access.

similar_products.short_desc: Fusion is an EMR built specifically to help OTs, PTs, & SLPs spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.
similar_products.features:
From Pediatrics to Geriatrics, Fusion EMR does it all for PTs, OTs & SLPs Practices! Features include billing, scheduling, waitlists, insights, teletherapy, documentation, and more to streamline your clinic!

Thousands of therapists across the country trust Fusion's EMR to make them (and their practices) more efficient.

Sign up for a free demo of Fusion today to find out how you can spend less time doing paperwork and more time treating patients.

similar_products.short_desc: TriMed offers a fully integrated software suite including EHR, PM, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, & Telemedicine.
similar_products.features: TriMed offers a complete software suite which includes Electronic Health Records, Practice Management, Patient Portal, Mobile, Check-in Module, and Telemedicine. Our products are fully integrated, so all modules seamlessly work together for your practice. Extremely robust. Very customizable. Template driven. We build our software around your workflow, not the other way around.

similar_products.short_desc: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers.
similar_products.features: BirchNotes enables users to grow and manage their practice. Designed specifically for mental health and substance abuse providers. Reduce time at intake with the client portal. Manage individual and group appointments, and meet your clients in person or through integrated Telehealth. Complete quick and easy charting with smart-fill and speech to text functionality. Set up autopay and require payment prior to your session to increase revenue. Schedule a demo today to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: TenEleven's electronic Clinical Record (eCR) solution provides the framework to thrive in a performance-based payment system.
similar_products.features: TenEleven Group is a software and services company, focused on providing solutions for health and human services agencies to manage their end-to-end business process. electronic Clinical Record (eCR) is an enterprise-level EHR solution for agencies with more than 10 users and provides solutions for a variety of service types. Inpatient, Outpatient, Community Based Services, and Medication-Assisted Treatment with medication dispensing functionality and dedicated billing services.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Chiropractic software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Chiropractic tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Chiropractic software automates practice management, billing, scheduling, patient care and reporting for chiropractic offices. Chiropractic offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of chiropractic SOAP notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, chiropractic practice management, electronic claims, collections and financial reporting. Chiropractic software is related to other Capterra directories like: Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Physical Therapy software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

related_categories.description: Dental software manages dental practice operations including billing, accounting, and scheduling. Dental offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential patient care and medical business processes including: compilation of notes and patient report generation, treatment records, accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Dental office software also typically offers a variety of data tools such as periodontal charting and three dimensional rendering or other visualization tools. Dental software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Medical Billing software, Medical Practice Management software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

Managers use Long Term Care applications to improve the efficiency and accuracy of their administrative functions. Long Term Care software offers a variety of flexible features which assist in the management and organization of patient records, billing and invoicing and staff and appointment scheduling. related_categories.description: Medical Billing software manages patient billing and collections for the medical industry. Hospitals, clinics, and doctors offices use these applications to centralize and automate essential business processes including: accounts receivable, payment processing, patient data sharing, document management, electronic claims, collections, and financial reporting. Medical Billing solutions typically allow for the tracking of patient demographics, background data, and insurance information. Medical Billing software is related to Chiropractic software, Claims Processing software, Dental software, Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Practice Management software and Medical Scheduling software.

related_categories.description: Medical Practice Management software automates activities such as patient care, scheduling, billing, claims processing and other related operations for medical practices. By streamlining office workflows, doctors and their staff are able to spend more time with patients and less time on administrative tasks. Medical Practice Management applications can be utilized by private practices, community health centers, long term care and behavioral health facilities, hospitals and other health care organizations. Medical Practice Management software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Billing software, Medical Scheduling software and Medical Transcription software.

These applications automate a broad range of business process functions for medical offices. Doctors and administrators use Medical Scheduling software to manage their appointment calendars, staff scheduling, patient records, and billing and invoicing. Medical Scheduling software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software, Medical Lab software, Medical Billing software and Medical Practice Management software.

related_categories.description: Medical Transcription software enables doctors to transcribe patient notes via voice dictation. Doctors and administrative personnel use Medical Transcription applications to speed the process of converting spoken notes into formal records. Typically Medical Transcription software provides automation tools facilitating fast and accurate transcriptions along with process oriented functions that allow efficient, accurate record management. Medical Transcription software is related to Electronic Medical Records software, Healthcare Management software and Medical Practice Management software.
